tool_description: This API provides all points (by latitude and longitude) in JSON format necessary to create graphical state boundaries.
title: State Boundaries

api_list.name: Boundaries by State
api_list.description: This endpoint gives you a JSON array of all state boundaries in the US to use for graphing
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://state-boundaries1.p.rapidapi.com/stateboundaries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "state-boundaries1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
